org.switchyard.component.common.composer

Class Composition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.switchyard.component.common.composer.Composition

  • public final class Composition
extends Object
    Utility class for Component-specific Composition classes.
    Author:
    David Ward <dward@jboss.org> (C) 2011 Red Hat Inc.
